rmi

Class RmiController<TInterface extends java.rmi.Remote>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.RmiController<TInterface>
  • Type Parameters:
    TInterface - the interface that the controller will expose through rmi
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RmiClient, RmiServer

    public abstract class RmiController<TInterface extends java.rmi.Remote>
extends java.lang.Object
    a client/server controller that utilizes java rmi

    rverbist
